about_the_game:
Welcome to a game where bluffs meet buffs!

Outwit, outplay and - if nothing else works - outdraw your opponents in this competitive poker-based PVP game. Play, level-up and rank with multiple characters each with their own set of game-affecting skills and progression tracks. 

Do you prefer just dominating your opponents with more chips? Can you take advantage of information abut what cards others are playing and how they play? Or is simply rigging the deck more your style?

Whatever you select, a unique scoring system makes every move you make counts - regardless of how the cards fall. Score points by making great laydowns, successfully bluffing,  playing aggressively, eliminating opponents and much more. 

Once you feel ready to fling some cards on the felt of battle, participate in various tournament formats where you win or lose depending on your accumulated score over multiple games. 

Unlike other F2P poker games, Hands of Victory is not monetized using virtual coins. You cannot buy your way to success. 

Eager to see what this is about?

While you wait for the Steam version to arrive, you can head no over to the game's website and try out the web-based version of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Playing this game you might be exposed to the odd glimpse of a stripper and encounter some foul language.
